name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.directoryscan.threads
description:
How many threads should the threadpool used to compile reports
  for volumes in parallel have.

name: mapreduce.reduce.shuffle.fetch.retry.interval-ms
description:
Time of interval that fetcher retry to fetch again when some
  non-fatal failure happens because of some events like NM restart.

name: dfs.client.socketcache.capacity
description:
Socket cache capacity (in entries) for short-circuit reads.
    If this value is set to 0, the client socket cache is disabled.

name: dfs.image.transfer.timeout
description:
Socket timeout for the HttpURLConnection instance used in the image
        transfer. This is measured in milliseconds.
        This timeout prevents client hangs if the connection is idle
        for this configured timeout, during image transfer.

name: dfs.block.access.token.lifetime
description: The lifetime of access tokens in minutes.

name: dfs.namenode.max-corrupt-file-blocks-returned
description:
The maximum number of corrupt file blocks listed by NameNode Web UI,
      JMX and other client request.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-resources-mb
description:
The maximum size (in MB) a map reduce job is allowed to submit
    for localization via files, libjars, archives, and jobjar command line
    arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to 0 the limit is
    ignored.
